tool_description: Calculates comprehensive fraud risk scores using machine learning models and rule-based analysis of transaction patterns.

previous_transactions.description: Array of previous transaction amounts for pattern analysis

account_age_days.description: Age of customer account in days

error_messages: Invalid transaction amount: Amount must be a positive number greater than 0.
Invalid timestamp format: Transaction time must be in ISO 8601 date-time format.
Invalid IP address format: Provide a valid IPv4 or IPv6 address.
Missing required parameters: customer_id, transaction_amount, merchant_category, transaction_time, ip_address, and user_agent are required.
Invalid country codes: Billing and shipping countries must be valid ISO 2-letter codes if provided.
usage: Provide core transaction details (amount, merchant_category, customer_id, transaction_time, ip_address, user_agent). Include optional historical data for better accuracy.

fraud_score.description: Fraud risk score from 0-100 (higher = more risky)
